Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Lecture \Lec"ture\, v. t. [imp. & p. p. {Lectured} (-t[-u]rd); p. pr. & vb. n. {Lecturing}.] 1. To read or deliver a lecture to. [1913 Webster]
2. To reprove formally and with authority. [1913 Webster]
lecturing n : teaching by giving a discourse on some subject (typically to a class) [syn: {lecture}]
